content: Who is the funniest person on the planet?

As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or the ability to determine who is the funniest person on the planet. Humor is subjective, and what one person finds funny, another might not. There are many comedians and individuals around the world who are known for their humor and ability to make people laugh, but it's impossible to single out one person as the funniest universally. It's more about individual preferences and cultural context.
